function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High particle emissions during speech and coughing","Impact":"Increased risk of transmitting contagious respiratory diseases","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce particle emissions such as wearing masks and improving ventilation","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in crowded indoor spaces","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners, and employers"},{"Description":"Super-emitters consistently releasing a large number of particles","Impact":"Higher risk of spreading contagious diseases within close proximity","Mitigation":"Identify super-emitters and provide appropriate protective measures such as isolation or increased ventilation","Technologies":"Real-time monitoring devices for particle emissions, air purifiers","People":"Close contacts of super-emitters in shared spaces","Owner":"Employers, building owners, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Increased droplet size and number during speech, especially after eating","Impact":"Elevated risk of droplet transmission due to larger and more numerous droplets","Mitigation":"Promote behaviors that reduce droplet emissions, such as speaking softly and avoiding close contact after eating","Technologies":"Behavioral education and communication, physical barriers such as plexiglass shields","People":"General public, individuals in communal dining or meeting areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers, and educational institutions"}]}
